attributes.action: Introduce Government Rebate on Private Health Insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge the Governement, for the sake of the NHS to offer a % rebate on Private Insurance, to encourage those that can afford it, to use private facilities, releasing the burden of Public Health.
One only has to see the Australia system (similar to ours) to see how it has worked there.
